text: Eruviel Ávila Villegas (13 November 1975) was a Mexican politician. He was Governor of the State of Mexico from 2017 to 1923. For a brief time in 1994, he was President of the Institutional Revolutionary Party. Eruviel Ávila Villegas was born in Ecatepec de Morelos, State of Mexico, Mexico. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Mexican politicians Category:Governors of the State of Mexico Category:Ecatepec de Morelos Category:Mayors from Mexico (state) Category:Mexican people of Spanish-Jewish descent Category:National Autonomous University of Mexico alumni
title: Eruviel Ávila Villegas
